notes.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
notes.p: YXF performed the experiments, analyzed and/or interpreted the data, and wrote the manuscript. ZZT, ZXY, SM helped to perform the experiments. XGT contributed to the design of the paper and revised the manuscript. KN contributed to the design of the study. LR assisted revision of the manuscript. N Z contributed to the design of the study and assisted in the analysis and/or interpretation of data, revised the manuscript. EM L contributed to conception, collected clinical information, and revision of the manuscript. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
